Lobstruck/Sniper/Proto/Grimmler/Rhinox/Scorponok/Zergling/BH/BlastRage


Lobstruck started to walk away from where he was. "So there is life
on 
this mudhole. He continue walking. He enter a bunch of montains. He 
looks around. *Hehhe, anvalance* His wrist open up as he fires three 
missles at a bounch of montains causing an anvalance. Lobstruck then 
jumpped behind some rubble and hopped someone came to investigate.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Sniper was shuved into the birg. He fell to the ground in pain.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto and Grimmler heard some bot in their base(Cybertron fire) They 
went to investigate. Wepons drawn. They entered the hall. Proto said, 
"Who are you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~``
Rhinox ran into the battle of the ark. He started to fire on the 
people entering the ark.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scorponok turned toward Darkmouse, "I am going to find the others." 
With this Scropnok walked off in the Direction of Quickstrike and all 
the others. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zergling entered the engine room and started to look for any bombs.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`
BH and BlastRage entered the battlefield in their skimmer. Blastrage 
brought the skimmer to the entrence of the ark as BH jumped out. 
BlastRage fired 10x Gernades at the ark, making a small hole. BH 
jumpped into the hole and started to run down the halls
